post.summary: Submit a document translation request to the Document Translation service
post.description:
Use this API to submit a bulk (batch) translation request to the Document Translation service.
Each request can contain multiple documents and must contain a source and destination container for each document.
            
The prefix and suffix filter (if supplied) are used to filter folders. The prefix is applied to the subpath after the container name.
            
Glossaries / Translation memory can be included in the request and are applied by the service when the document is translated.
            
If the glossary is invalid or unreachable during translation, an error is indicated in the document status.
If a file with the same name already exists at the destination, it will be overwritten. The targetUrl for each target language must be unique.

202.description: Successful request and the batch request is created by the service.  The header Operation-Location will indicate a status url with the operation id.

get.summary: Returns a list of batch requests submitted and the status for each request
get.description:
Returns a list of batch requests submitted and the status for each request.
This list only contains batch requests submitted by the user (based on the subscription). The status for each request is sorted by id.
            
If the number of requests exceeds our paging limit, server-side paging is used. Paginated responses indicate a partial result and include a continuation token in the response.
The absence of a continuation token means that no additional pages are available.
            
$top and $skip query parameters can be used to specify a number of results to return and an offset for the collection.
            
The server honors the values specified by the client. However, clients must be prepared to handle responses that contain a different page size or contain a continuation token.
            
When both $top and $skip are included, the server should first apply $skip and then $top on the collection.
Note: If the server can't honor $top and/or $skip, the server must return an error to the client informing about it instead of just ignoring the query options.
This reduces the risk of the client making assumptions about the data returned.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description:
Take the $top entries in the collection
When both $top and $skip are supplied, $skip is applied first

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description:
Skip the $skip entries in the collection
When both $top and $skip are supplied, $skip is applied first

200.description: Successful request and returns the status of the all the operations

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request.

ETag.description: The ETag response-header field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested variant. Used with If-Match, If-None-Match and If-Range to implement optimistic concurrency control.

get.summary: Returns the status for a specific document
get.description: Returns the translation status for a specific document based on the request Id and document Id.

200.description: Successful request and it is accepted by the service.  The operation details are returned

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request.

ETag.description: The ETag response-header field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested variant. Used with If-Match, If-None-Match and If-Range to implement optimistic concurrency control.

get.summary: Returns the status for a document translation request
get.description:
Returns the status for a document translation request.
The status includes the overall request status, as well as the status for documents that are being translated as part of that request.

200.description: Successful request and returns the status of the batch translation operation

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request.

ETag.description: The ETag response-header field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested variant. Used with If-Match, If-None-Match and If-Range to implement optimistic concurrency control.

delete.summary: Cancel a currently processing or queued operation
delete.description:
Cancel a currently processing or queued operation.
Cancel a currently processing or queued operation.
An operation will not be cancelled if it is already completed or failed or cancelling. A bad request will be returned.
All documents that have completed translation will not be cancelled and will be charged.
All pending documents will be cancelled if possible.

get.summary: Returns the status for all documents in a batch document translation request
get.description:
Returns the status for all documents in a batch document translation request.
            
The documents included in the response are sorted by document Id in descending order. If the number of documents in the response exceeds our paging limit, server-side paging is used.
Paginated responses indicate a partial result and include a continuation token in the response. The absence of a continuation token means that no additional pages are available.
            
$top and $skip query parameters can be used to specify a number of results to return and an offset for the collection.
The server honors the values specified by the client. However, clients must be prepared to handle responses that contain a different page size or contain a continuation token.
            
When both $top and $skip are included, the server should first apply $skip and then $top on the collection.
Note: If the server can't honor $top and/or $skip, the server must return an error to the client informing about it instead of just ignoring the query options.
This reduces the risk of the client making assumptions about the data returned.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description:
Take the $top entries in the collection
When both $top and $skip are supplied, $skip is applied first

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description:
Skip the $skip entries in the collection
When both $top and $skip are supplied, $skip is applied first

200.description: Successful request and returns the status of the documents

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long to wait before making a new request.

ETag.description: The ETag response-header field provides the current value of the entity tag for the requested variant. Used with If-Match, If-None-Match and If-Range to implement optimistic concurrency control.

get.summary: Returns a list of supported document formats
get.description:
The list of supported document formats supported by the Document Translation service.
The list includes the common file extension, as well as the content-type if using the upload API.

200.description: Returns the list of supported document file formats

get.summary: Returns the list of supported glossary formats
get.description:
The list of supported glossary formats supported by the Document Translation service.
The list includes the common file extension used.

200.description: Returns the list of supported glossary file formats

get.summary: Returns a list of supported storage sources
get.description: Returns a list of storage sources/options supported by the Document Translation service.

200.description: Successful request and returns the list of storage sources

prefix.description:
A case-sensitive prefix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. 
For example, when using a Azure storage blob Uri, use the prefix to restrict sub folders for translation.

suffix.description:
A case-sensitive suffix string to filter documents in the source path for translation. 
This is most often use for file extensions

sourceUrl.description: Location of the folder / container or single file with your documents

language.description:
Language code
If none is specified, we will perform auto detect on the document

Glossary.description: Glossary / translation memory for the request

glossaryUrl.description:
Location of the glossary. 
We will use the file extension to extract the formatting if the format parameter is not supplied.

If the translation language pair is not present in the glossary, it will not be applied

TargetInput.description: Destination for the finished translated documents

targetUrl.description: Location of the folder / container with your documents

category.description: Category / custom system for translation request

StorageInputType.description: Storage type of the input documents source string

BatchRequest.description: Definition for the input batch translation request

targets.description: Location of the destination for the output

inputs.description: The input list of documents or folders containing documents

Status.description: List of possible statuses for job or document

lastActionDateTimeUtc.description: Date time in which the operation's status has been updated

value.description: The summary status of individual operation

@nextLink.description: Url for the next page.  Null if no more pages available

ErrorCodeV2.description: Enums containing high level error codes.

InnerErrorV2.description:
New Inner Error format which conforms to Cognitive Services API Guidelines which is available at https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/%3Aw%3A/t/CognitiveServicesPMO/EUoytcrjuJdKpeOKIK_QRC8BPtUYQpKBi8JsWyeDMRsWlQ?e=CPq8ow.
This contains required properties ErrorCode, message and optional properties target, details(key value pair), inner error(this can be nested).

target.description:
Gets the source of the error. 
For example it would be "documents" or "document id" in case of invalid document.

ErrorV2.description: This contains an outer error with error code, message, details, target and an inner error with more descriptive details.

target.description:
Gets the source of the error. 
For example it would be "documents" or "document id" in case of invalid document.

path.description: Location of the document or folder

lastActionDateTimeUtc.description: Date time in which the operation's status has been updated

detectedLanguage.description: Detected language of the original document (to be implemented)

progress.description: Progress of the translation if available

value.description: The detail status of individual documents

@nextLink.description: Url for the next page.  Null if no more pages available

fileExtensions.description: Supported file extension for this format

FileFormatListResult.description: Base type for List return in our api

StorageSourceListResult.description: Base type for List return in our api

ErrorResponseV2.description:
Contains unified error information used for HTTP responses across any Cognitive Service. Instances
can be created either through Microsoft.CloudAI.Containers.HttpStatusExceptionV2 or by returning it directly from
a controller.

subscription_key.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
subscription_key.description: Provide your cognitive services subscription key here.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).
